content:
Rustem Umerov's Defense Minister discussed US Defense Minister Lloyd Austin Planning Ukraine's defense needs.

About this hereportedOn your Facebook page.

Rustem Umerov noted that for two days he spent several hours in negotiations with American partners, working with the US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin in bilateral format.

“The planning of Ukraine's defense needs was discussed in detail. Thank you for the support, we work for victory! ” - the minister wrote.

As reported by the Army, on the eve of Rustem UmerovreportedThe results of the meeting group meeting, noting that Ukraine is actively working with partners to make the F-16 planes as soon as possible in our sky.

The main topics of the meeting of the 20th meeting in the format "Ramstein" were: ammunition, air defense, F-16 and drones.
title: Rustem Umerov discussed with the head of the Pentagon the planning of defense needs of Ukraine
description: He reported this on his Facebook page. Rustem Umerov noted that during ...
